info.brief_description: You find a lucky penny on the way to school
info.description: You are preteen boy named, Brandon. On the way to school you find a penny. You have a test today and told youself if you ace the test you will toss it in the wish pond after school. Since you aced it, after school you tossed the penny in the pond with you wish in mind and get a slight headache. You go to bed, when wake up the next mourning your headache has not gone away. Good thing it was saturday.
